summary:
The power of telekinesis is now your weapon of destruction.
Adds 6 new powerful spells from weak Novice to powerful Master and makes the vanilla telekinesis deadly.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=orange] The power of [/color][color=teal]telekinesis[/color][color=orange] is now your weapon of destruction.
Adds 6 new powerful spells from Novice to Master and makes the vanilla telekinesis deadly.
It is QUITE a load of fun. Uses quite a bunch of magicka too. You can get them from Tolfdir, and some from other alteration merchants. I recommend you pay for the tomes instead of using the console. All spells and tomes come with descriptions and visible effects.
The Spells:[/color] [color=limegreen]
Telekinetic Drag <- Drag enemies towards you..
Telekinetic Pull <- Pull enemies towards you... [/color] [color=yellow]
Telekinetic Spear <- Spear a foe or two away!
Telekinetic Vortex <- Sucks enemies towards you so you can bomb them with a stronger spell. The weak enemies usually die from the friction though. [/color] [color=orange]
Telekinetic Cannon <- Dual kinetic cannons to really blast your foes away.
[/color][color=magenta]Telekinetic Fury[/color][color=orange] <- Blasts everyone away with nice effects.[/color]
All spells apply friction to the enemies, hurting them over time.
[color=orange] Vortex(75 alteration) applies the most friction, able to kill things very quickly.
Also, Telekinetic Fury can go through walls.[/color] Note: This is not very overpowered, as you can see in the screenshots.[color=orange]
Constructive Criticism is appreciated! May modify the spells based on user suggestions. Please speak up if there are any bugs :)[/color]
[size=4]Not nearly as much fun as my Starbomb spells. Those launch your enemies, or you, into orbit. Get them [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19865]here![/url][/size][size=3]
Give credit if you implement or modify my mod and distribute it :) [/size][/size]
[size=1]Note: I have tried to implement the telekinesis effect on NPCs, but the telekinesis effect itself is a "cast on self" spell while you point at an object. I would need to know scripting to be able to make a remotely similar spell. I believe there is already a spell that grabs your opponent exactly like telekinesis.[/size]
[size=4]My Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19865]Starbomb Spells and Arrows![/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19776]Deadly Telekinesis[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19769]Flamehazer the Molten Greatsword[/url][/size]
author: Richgar
